name: Ducks vs Humans
description:
Ducks vs Humans is a Tower Defense Game made by Sheridan College Students as a part of a mini-capstone submission. It is meant to be a small game able to implement dynamic systems and  multiple design patterns also have crossplay functionality between PC and Android. Uses Unity and Photon Network. 

Team:

Xinyu Dong - Programmer

Mikhail Smetankin - Programmer

Divesh Jagger - Programmer

Made in Winter 2021 term.
